name: Readur
description: Readur is a powerful and modern document management system designed to help individuals and teams efficiently organize, process, and access their digital documents. Built with a high-performance Rust backend and a sleek React frontend, it offers advanced OCR with Tesseract, multi-language support, PostgreSQL full-text search, WebDAV/S3 integration, watch folder monitoring, OIDC authentication, and comprehensive labeling and organization features.
author: perfectra1n

form_fields.label: JWT Secret
form_fields.hint: Secret key for JWT token signing. Auto-generated for security.

form_fields.label: Database Password
form_fields.hint: PostgreSQL database password. Auto-generated for security.

form_fields.label: Admin Username
form_fields.hint: Username for the admin account. Default: admin

form_fields.label: Admin Password
form_fields.hint: Password for admin account (min 8 chars). If not set, a secure password will be auto-generated and shown in logs on first startup.

form_fields.label: OCR Language
form_fields.hint: Tesseract OCR language codes. Use + for multiple languages (e.g., eng+fra+deu)

form_fields.label: Concurrent OCR Jobs
form_fields.hint: Number of parallel OCR processing jobs. Adjust based on CPU cores.

form_fields.label: Max File Size (MB)
form_fields.hint: Maximum file size for uploads in megabytes.

form_fields.label: Watch Interval (seconds)
form_fields.hint: How often to scan the watch folder for new files.

form_fields.label: Allow Local Authentication
form_fields.hint: Enable username/password login. Disable if using OIDC only.
